name: PocketEinstein for Android
short_description:
Hi dear developer or user friend you may are readign this for chance or because you search an app that solve your math/physics and other subjects problems and for make easy you homework.

Well on the market are many apps for the solution of equations,graphics,presentation focusing on a small number of functions . But doesn´t exist a only app who resolve a complete group of problems .

Pocket Einstein is a project for make a complete suit of math and physics. Thath help the Android Users to make faster,easy and effective they needs when solving problems of school or work failitar also studying these two subjects.

For now Pocket Einstein´s project 1.1 is only available for Android and a HTML5 version , centred on Math and Physic .
summary: And mobile app for make easy the school problems.
